title: Cryptostephanus
text: Cryptostephanus is a <a href="genus">genus</a> of <a href="Africa">Africa</a>n plants in the <a href="Amaryllidaceae">Amaryllis family</a>, native to Kenya, <a href="Tanzania">Tanzania</a>, <a href="Angola">Angola</a>, <a href="Mozambique">Mozambique</a>, <a href="Zimbabwe">Zimbabwe</a> and <a href="Namibia">Namibia</a>. Its closest relative is "<a href="Clivia">Clivia</a>", with which it shares some characters, including thick, fleshy roots, strap-like leaves, and fruit in the form of a <a href="Berry%20%28botany%29">berry</a>.
